name: Memory Quest (alwex)
description:
Memory games with a twist. Memory Quest is one modern and engaging memory game based on pair matching objects. This object matching game will challenge your memory and improve your concentration skills.
Memory Quest is a great and fun way to train your brain, ideal for you and the whole family.
Find the matching objects, defeat the memory lord!

Fun and for all ages with an intelligent increasing difficulty curve that will train your memory in an efficient and non boring way.

With this pair matching game, your memory is challenged by a finely crafted artificial intelligence that simulates real human brains. The higher you get in the tower, the smarter the enemies!

Why should you play this game? Memory Quest is not only a fun game to play, but it is also a powerful tool to improve your skills and increase your memory accuracy. This game is an ideal companion to help with memory and concentration problems like ADHD.

You can play alone with the tower mode or challenge your friends or family in the entertaining versus mode where you create matching object pairs to defeat your opponent and train your memory together.
